description:
Agile Africa 2016 Guest Speaker, Hitesh Sanghavi focusses on product owner challenges and setting business objectives in an agile world.
Agile Africa is a WITS JCSE (Joburg Centre for Software Engineering) initiative. Visit: agileafricaconf.com #AgileAfrica
title: Agile Africa 2016 Interview: Hitesh Sanghavi
